page.title: 19Local Transport
page.content: Children tend to use bicycles around the village. Longer journeys are usually taken by car as most of the population have one or even two cars. The National bus services provide transport into Banbury, Brackley and the surrounding area. The bus shelter in Greatworth is located opposite the square. Work buses are operated by the following firms:_ B.S.C.Footwear Ltd.,Manor Rd. Brackley, Sun Valley Poultry Ltd.,Buckingham Rd, Brackley, Export Packing, Chipping Warden, Faccenda Chicken Ltd., Brackley. The nearset railway station is at Banbury where people can catch trains to London and Birmingham.
